name: 2020 A Space Adventure
description:
2020: A Space Adventure
Single-player, 3rd Person, Adventure game for PC, Age: 8+

This game is a reference to the cancelled mission to Mars in 2020. The rocket ship left the earth for its long journey to Mars, but on the way, a time-hole sucked it in and transferred it to an alien planet. Upon landing, the rocket blew away various essential celebratory items of the inhabitant aliens and scared away the sacred bird. Now, humans, the player, have to use their emissary-robot and make up for all the accidents, by completing various tasks to help restore the festival and bring back the sacred bird.

Game Design Document (GDD): Provided above

Gameplay Video: 


This project was created as part of a second year university brief at the University of South Wales, in association with Tiny Rebel Games. The module brief was "The 2020 Which Wasn't". Teams had to make games that were 8 to 10 minutes long, with a novel interaction system, about an event that might have happened in 2020 but didn't.

Find out more about the University of South Wales Games' courses at http://www.southwales.ac.uk/games and http://www.twitter.com/uswgames
